snippet.title: Space Tripper 2001 PC - Gameplay
snippet.description: Astro Tripper is a top-down horizontal-scrolling space shooter first released in 2008 as the direct sequel to the 2005 game Space Tripper. It was developed by UK indie developer PomPom Games to be a 1080p HD top-down shooter available on PlayStation Network and Steam for Microsoft Windows
